title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\LegacyAbac
name: LegacyAbac
description:
Configuration for the legacy Attribute Based Access Control authorization mode.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.LegacyAbac

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Whether the ABAC authorizer is enabled for this cluster. When enabled, identities in the system, including service accounts, nodes, and controllers, will have statically granted permissions beyond those provided by the RBAC configuration or IAM.

methods.name: getEnabled
methods.description:
